title: Apollo 11 Moon Landing
description: Neil Armstrong becomes the first human to step on the Moon.

title: Fall of the Berlin Wall
description: The Berlin Wall falls, symbolizing the end of the Cold War.

title: United States Declaration of Independence
description: The United States declares independence from Great Britain.

title: Atomic Bombing of Hiroshima
description: The United States drops an atomic bomb on Hiroshima, Japan.

title: March on Washington
description: Martin Luther King Jr. delivers his 'I Have a Dream' speech.
